azure_project.description: Optionally set the Azure DevOps project name of the pull request. Required for Azure DevOps

pull_request_files.description: Set to true if you want to retrieve the files changed in the pull request. Not supported by Azure DevOps.

pull_request_id.description: ID of the pull request to retrieve

repository_name.description: Set the repository name of the pull request

repository_organization.description: Set the organization name of the pull request
